entities.name: windscreen
entities.description: The windscreen is mentioned as an obstacle that Fang flung himself at to get out of the car.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The forest is where Harry and Ron are located when they reach its edge.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is a dog that flung himself at the windscreen to get out of the car.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's house is where Fang runs off to after getting out of the car.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who gets out of the car after a minute or so.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of Ron's friends who gets out of the car first.

relationships.description: Fang flung himself at the windscreen to get out of the car.
Harry got out of the car after Fang shot off through the trees.
Ron followed Harry out of the car after a minute or so.
Fang ran off to Hagrid's house after getting out of the car.
Ron followed Fang to Hagrid's house.
